scripts.start: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/main.js
scripts.docker-build: npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- cross-env-shell docker build -t $TAG .
scripts.docker-build-pi4: npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- cross-env-shell docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64/v8 --provenance=false -t $TAG .
